website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, efficient model that works well in most moisture-prone environments that call for a small dehumidifier.
pros: Efficient and very easy to operate
Doesn't take up much space, yet does a good job removing moisture from most small rooms
Also generates enthusiasm for use in closets and RVs
cons: Power cable is in a somewhat awkward position
Not quite as quiet as some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Little Machine.
customer_reviews.text: Upon moving into our new townhome, we discovered we had a really humid place with poor air circulation. We bought this dehumidifier for our bathroom originally, but it hasn't left our kitchen as it truly makes our home cooler and less humid in our hot, sticky Missouri summer. We have a 1,000 square foot place and collected almost 1/2 cup of water in just 24 hours. It's sleek, quiet, and modern looking and I highly recommend one for each floor of the house!
customer_reviews.author: Jessa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't accumulate any water but I did get a refund
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it. it didn't accumulate any water in my damp closet so, as an experiment, I put it on in a steamy bathroom for a long time. It accumulated about a teaspoon (maybe a tablespoon?) of water. I don't know if mine was just not working right, but the seller never answered me when I asked. I'm grateful for the refund.
customer_reviews.author: JF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Boats
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for my boat. It works great to leave on 24 hours a day and I can’t believe how much moisture is collected. Very Quiet. This is my 3rd purchase. Had the other 2 in the bathrooms and added this for our guest room. Keeps everything dry and no odors!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike M.

customer_reviews.title: The Difference is Noticeable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this humidifier when the temperatures started to flare in Texas summer and my apartment became worse than damp. The AC couldn’t freeze out the humidity and I don’t trust opening my windows in my neighborhood. Bugs and burglars! Within an hour of the machine running I could breathe easier. Within a day, I didn’t need my AC. Even when the temps climb up over 90, I rarely need my AC now. I usually dump out the water myself before it’s full, so that way I can keep it running continuously. One night, the machine turned off while I was asleep and I woke up the next morning feeling totally scummy and damp. It’s really powerful and very effective!
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Some faults
customer_reviews.text: The device is taking water from the air very well, and better then a previous make. I do not like the electrical cord where it is over the water tray as I am concerned about water and electrical cord being too close to each other. I would have preferred electrical jack in the back. It would be better if the tray pulled out more smoothly as you have to hold the machine when pulling out the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Ted J.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These things are tiny, but powerful! After about a week it is absolutely full of water! We have a tiny bathroom, so it's not having to work overtime, but even the one we put in our living room does an okay job. I knocked off one star just because I do feel like this is only meant for smaller rooms, and it does take at least a full week to fill, but it still works as excpected and I'm grateful to have found something so asthetically pleasing for small a descent price.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Has a two-year warranty, but stopped dehumidifying within a few months, at the most. I noticed that the tub took a long time to fill up, then it stopped collecting any water at some point. I don't know when it stopped collecting humidity. It might have been defective from the very beginning since it took so long to fill the collection tub. Got my money back.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Good For the Money
customer_reviews.text: I’m happy with this purchase. I got this one on sale for $60. I live in a small apartment (650sqft) and I can tell a significant difference throughout the apt. I do wish I would have gotten the bigger one, I’m just not willing to spend $100 on a dehumidifier. It took about three days for it to become 3/4 of the way full. It’s noise level is that of a ceiling fan on low/medium. I think it was well worth the $60. Would be great for a bathroom or closet. Would recommend a bigger one for a basement or apartment larger than 650sqft.
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Noticeable difference
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two additional mini dehumidifiers for the closets of our mid rise apartment, which fortunately have power outlets. DampRid is not cutting it. The hallways of our building are not air conditioned so heat and humidity seeps in so easily. The one dehumidifier box I have opened seems to work well. It is whisper quiet and not disruptive at all. Very little water has collected, however. The closets feel a bit dryer but it is hard to tell when you compare the humidity of external rooms and when the closets are super warm and not air conditioned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, efficient and stylish
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased my first mini in 2017 and currently use it to help with humidity in a seasonal porch. Due to its effectiveness I purchased the second one for a large kitchen pantry to help with stuffy air and moisture. Overall, I have been very satisfied with the PureEnrichment products I own. They are quiet, easy to use/maintain, have a nice appearance/style and get the job done. Having had such a positive experience with said products will definitely seek out the PureEnrichment product line in the future when the need arises.
customer_reviews.author: SLD

customer_reviews.title: The design is pretty, but it doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The design is pretty, but it doesn't work. The booklet that comes with it says that it can extract up to 10 oz. of water per day. It has been running in my apartment, which is very humid for 6 days and has barely extracted any water. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Sakura

customer_reviews.title: good for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, good for small spaces. Not great, but can take the edge of the humidity off in a small space. My wife put it in her small office, and it took a bit of the dampness out, if she left it running all night and on weekends. A bit loud in small spaces though, which is a bit of a Catch 22, since those are the spaces for which it is effective. The weekends and evenings thing works okay though.
customer_reviews.author: drjohn1963

customer_reviews.title: Weak; dead in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: It worked okay in the beginning, but it has never been as strong as my previous dehumidifier by Ivation. Currently it does absolutely nothing. The water collection container is empty after running all night and the condensation in my bathroom is everywhere, so I do believe it is no longer working. It lasted less than a year, not a worthy product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dez Jones

customer_reviews.title: I feel like I been cheated
customer_reviews.text: This item is too expensive for what it does. I feel like I been cheated. Since I got it, the product has not gotten full not even halfway. I been using it for the rooms and have changed the item to several rooms to see if it collects water but it doesn't seem to collect much at all. When I use my big dehumidifier to see if there is no more humidity in the rooms the big dehumidifier gets full in one day. Would not recomend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy German

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well, not sure it's removing 10oz of moisture ...
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty well, not sure it's removing 10oz of moisture per day from my damp cellar, but it's definitely removing something. Best part is, at only about 25 watts, it only costs a few pennies per day to operate. My old dehumidifier was costing me $25/month in electricity to run. Wish it had a direct drain option instead of emptying the tank manually. I made my own with a 1/4" barb fitting and some 1/4" vinyl tubing
customer_reviews.author: Mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Best dehumidifier ever!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for small rooms. We live in Louisiana and it's very humid here. I bought this for the kids bathroom and it works amazing! as a busy mom of two babies this thing is perfect! We needed something to collect the moisture in the kids bathroom and this guy does the job. It's small so it doesn't take up room and very quiet. at night I just dump the water out and it's back to collecting.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product should serve me well.
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the product seems great right out of the box. I purchased this product to remove humidity from the air in my travel trailer. Camping with the air conditioner on and the windows closed creates a lot of humidity in the enclosed trailer so this should be just the thing for a 7' x 14' space. It may be a while before I get to actually test it in these conditions, but I tested it in my house and it works just fine, and isn't very loud.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt work at all
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed in the product I received. I decided to buy this after having read all the great reviews this product had. I've been using it for the past weeks and there has not even been a single drop of water collected in the water tank. I use it in the small bathroom that easily gets humid after a hot shower and still nothing. Is there anyway I can return this? I had expected this to work so I have already thrown away the box
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.  Buy a larger, quality machine.
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use, it’s just a matter of turning the machine off or on. Is much smaller than I expected. I would say that i received a malfunctioning product as it barely collect humidity. I could leave it on for 24 hours and only one quarter of the container gets full. At any given time.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Real happy to date with this little TEC dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: Real happy to date with this little TEC dehumidifier. I am drilling through the catch bucket to add a valve so as to drain the condensate to the galley sink but this is a great option for keeping my boat dry and has been chugging away since I bought it. As the only moving part is the fan, I expect this will serve me well for quite a while and seems to be doing a good job keeping the interior of my Pearson 27 dry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Needed this for my beardy. With these last few unexpected rainstorms my desert pet got sick. Just got this the day after I ordered. Not the quietest, but still good. A little picky for positioning but efficient at its job. The little guy seems to do better so Im happy. Now the humidity is down by 20% just after the first day. I'm glad that I'm able to obtain this even tough its not a very popular item to have here in Idaho. It came here quick and now my pet is on his way to recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for tiny living spaces
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small 490 sq ft condo and this is the perfect size. I can easily move it from the living/kitchen space into the bedroom. It is very quiet and actually makes for a pleasant background sound for sleeping. It is light and easy to move from room to room. I was surprised at how much moisture it has been pulling from my space every day. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Desktop Dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: This little dehumidifier is quiet and efficient. I have one in each of my two bedrooms where I had a problem with excess humidity. These little machines remove excess moisture as humidity changes due to weather. They are easy to monitor because of the design. Customer service is excellent if you have questions. I HIGHLY recommend the Pure Delux Mini Dehumidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Blackwelder

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing little product. Does what it has too doZ some people need patience and realize that this machine does not take a day to collect 2 cups of water and then write a horrible review! I had my machine for almost a month and it already has over three cups of water or more. I am just waiting to see how it turns off. I am very happy for my purchase, can not wait to get another one.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia D

customer_reviews.title: Best use in closets
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great product for closets. I wouldn’t recommend a bathroom or bedroom if you’re looking for something to really take the humidity out of the air.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little humidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mini Pure enrichment humidifier about a week ago and I must say that I am totally satisfied. My room is located downstairs and felt really musty and humid. After this powerful little humidifier went to work, that musty, humid feel went away overnight and my sleep improved. Not only did it feel drier in my room but also cooler. That's a huge plus for living in a house with no AC. Plus, it's so sleek looking and the soft sound it makes lulls me right to sleep. I love it and would recommend it to anyone looking for a new humidifier.
customer_reviews.author: Flavius Floruta

customer_reviews.title: Good machine
customer_reviews.text: Got this dehumidifier several weeks ago during some wet fall weather in the northeast. Use it in a room about 12' x 12'. Love the white noise "hum" it makes - I tend to sleep with a fan on so this noise can take its place. I've run the machine for a couple days straight and it tends to pull maybe 25 cu. in. of water from the air (at say 60 rh)/two days, and help drop the humidity in the room by a point or so a day. It's a good little machine, maybe even better for smaller areas. The free humidity/temp gauge is a nice perk and helps you decide when its best to run this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Really does collect plenty of water. We had moisture issues in our bathroom and master bedroom. Just having this on seems to help so much. We alternate using it in our bathroom and our bedroom to keep moisture levels down. It runs super quietly and is nice and compact. Water tray is also easy to release and is very easy to take out without spilling everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Suitable for tiny spaces only
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dry out small space as well as it should. It may be suitable for perhaps a closet space, but anything bigger this won't do the job.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: This littler dehumidifier works perfectly for my laundry room. Really happy with it! I actually bought a second one I was so pleased. The only reason I gave it a 4 out of 5 stars is the cord plugs into the top of the device which is a little awkward. But I think it's because the water collection box is at the bottom. Highly recommend for small spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Tiny. I couldn't believe the ad said this thing could work in a room up to 2200ft...It doesn't look like it could clear the humidity in my small closet. Needless to say it's going back and I'm getting a " real" dehumidifier for upstairs. I had hoped I could get a more compact model but alas, it's going to be one of those bulky things but at least I know they work.
customer_reviews.author: E. Constable

customer_reviews.title: Little powerhouse!
customer_reviews.text: I give it a 5 because its a little powerhouse. We moved into an old plantation house built in the 1930s that turned out to have quite a mold problem. I am very allergic to mold & had a constant sore throat. Within days of receiving the dehumidifiers I began feeling so much better & the sore throat (and other allergy symptoms) has not returned! The strong mold smell in one room is also gone. Also, very quiet operation & unit shuts off when water full. Mahalo many times for the great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's okay, louder than expected and no convenient way to route the power cable
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to work as advertised as it has taken little time for water to accumulate in the reservoir after having run the unit for just over 48 hours. The power cable tends to lay over the input vents for the unit's intake and there is no hook/clamp mechanism to keep the power cable out of the way. The unit runs louder than I expected, the sound level being more on pair with running an oscillating fan for one's room. Overall though, the unit works as advertised to remove water from the air.
customer_reviews.author: David Harvey

customer_reviews.title: And pretty reliably it delivers around a cup of water every ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this little machine to keep the air dryer on the days when the weather did not warrant turning the AC on. But even now in the midst of Florida summer heat, we keep this guy running along the AC. And pretty reliably it delivers around a cup of water every 24 hours. Quiet enough to be used in the bedroom, and looks more modern than comparable models from other manufacturers. It's not an industrial work horse, but it keeps our small apartment less humid and AC set to a higher temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maybe if you poured water directly into it, then it might fill up.
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what this thing is supposed to do!?! Well, I know what it is "supposed" to do, but it doesn't do it. Used it in a travel trailer (with a small leak in the roof) in PNW rainy season and it couldn't even pull any moisture into it! All this when the windows were fogged up.....don't waste your time on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Techspec360

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: I have it in my master bathroom that’s next to my bathroom and my bathroom fan is louder than this little mighty. Very quiet and I’m hopeful that this is going to help reduce the after shower humidity quickly.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Clever device but very littl moisture removed
customer_reviews.text: This device has too little water removalal capcacity for my needs even though its well designed and compact. Might be o.k.for something like controlling dampness in a closet; but for serious dampness sometig bigger seems to be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Walter B. Dadik

customer_reviews.title: Good compact- perfect for bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but needed to remove some moisture from a small bathroom- and boy does it! For the size, holds a good amount of water. I have zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Doe

customer_reviews.title: Small and puny
customer_reviews.text: I have a small 8x6 bathroom with a fan but the towels never seem to dry. This machine has taken the mildew odor away but the towels still aren't really drying out and it is constantly on. Not really helping that well for the amount of time it's on
customer_reviews.author: Julia M. Garrison

customer_reviews.title: great small humidifier.
customer_reviews.text: This works quite well to keep humidity at bay in my beer storage refrigerator. I drilled a hole in the tank and installed a flexible hose and put it through the refrigerators drain plug in the bottom to auto drain.
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Quiet and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I use this dehumidifier to keep the humidity down in my unheated storage space. The previous one didn't have a large enough water receptacle, and the motor died after a couple of years. This one seems great - quiet and powerful. And holds a lot of water. It is also easy to empty.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and works perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim after feeling the humidity in my room this summer. Honestly, I didn't need a big humidifier and this worked as it should. I have a pretty big room and it does a fine job getting the moisture out of the air. I've left this thing on pretty much all day when I'm not home and it's been working as good as the day I received it. Also has a nice subtle design to it, which is what drew me to my purchase. Would definitely buy again for another room. It's inexpensive and works as advertised!
customer_reviews.author: Mikey620

customer_reviews.title: I'm rather disappointed in this dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I'm rather disappointed in this dehumidifier. It has had no appreciable effect on the humidity in my apartment. Over the course of 2.5 days, it has pulled only 10oz (under a cup) of water from the air--which is the expected absorption rate for just 1 day. I'm in Ohio, and it has been very humid here lately, so I would have expected it to pull significantly more water, especially since it was also running in the bathroom after a shower. I'm wondering if I received a faulty unit like one of the other reviewers.
customer_reviews.author: David Hammond

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work. I’m so mad. I didn’t ...
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. I’m so mad. I didn’t realize I only had a month to return it. I thought I’d give it a chance and see maybe if it worked but he barely takes nothing out of the air. That and I kept forgetting request to return it because i have to go all the way to the other side of town to drop it off and don’t ever have time.
customer_reviews.author: monique tamez

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with my purchase of this product! I mainly use it for the bathroom when I take hot showers and all the moisture gets trapped so the windows get all fogged up, since my ceiling fan doesn’t work properly. This sleek little thing does the trick! No more fogged up windows, which helps me get ready to hit the town a ton faster! It’s also quiet, so it doesn’t interfere with me singing in the shower while I listen to my music. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Salazar

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE IT WORKS, NOT COMPLICATED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even deserve the one star rating! Came fine in a secure Styrofoam package, but did nothing the first two nights of use )except using electricity!) . I had to leave the State's after learning of my father-in-law passing, sorry for the late review and sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Air

customer_reviews.title: Rarely write reviews, but this dehumidifier is worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I depend on reviews heavily, so I figured I should pay it forward. This is an excellent product and works very well in my small, basement-level apartment. I use it primarily in a walk-in closet and it collects about a cup of water every other day or so. I use it overnight, so two things - the operating noise level is low and the green power light is only as bright as a dim cable box. Hardly noticeable. Also, love the small profile.
customer_reviews.author: Anon.

customer_reviews.title: Quite and cost Effective
customer_reviews.text: I was in the market for a small basement bedroom dehumidifier to help alleviate excess moisture. After comparing features and cost, I chose Pure Enrichment Premium Dehumidifier. I liked the sleek modern look and the size. I was amazed at how quite it was and how munch better the room feels.This unit has ran non-stop, without any issues. If I ever have a need for a small dehumidifier, I would strongly advise buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate it less that one star, I would... set it near sopping wet carpet and not one drop was in the reservoir. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: S. Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Great no mess no fuss.
customer_reviews.text: I am in the Pacific Northwest and I use this in my camp trailer and it is working great. It is a lot easier than using products like drysair. Just plug it in and empty it when it is full. It shuts off when full so no mess. I recommend this for anyone who has a humidity problem in their camper or even a small apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The reviews overall were good, but individual bad reviews made me hesitant
customer_reviews.text: The reviews overall were good, but individual bad reviews made me hesitant, especially because the good ones seemed like they are paid reviews so I wanted to let you know of my personal positive experience. I put this in a tiny house in the woods where I was having a problem with moisture and mold. This product works great for what I got it for, it fills up fast (but not too fast). I've noticed the humidity went down a lot. For a small device, it works well and the looks of it are great. Perfect for small locations.
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Anderson

customer_reviews.title: It definitely takes moisture out of the air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my bedroom and adjoining bath with the intention of removing excess humidity. It's air conditioned space, but still muggy. I'm not sure the unit helps cools the room. It does remove moisture in the air. The sound is about the same as a fan on low setting. The unit is sturdy and easy to operate. I would recommend as long as people had the realistic expectation that the unit is not an air conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for my apartment, because the humidity runs high in my closet and from the weather. Stuck them to work as soon as I got them and they work very fast. Water extraction was happening within the first 30 min - an hour of firing em up. I will say that the placement of the cord being in the front is awkward and the tank isn't very big, but if you're looking for something space conservative, I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tam Lo Mein

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Nursery
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the nursery in lieu of an air conditioner and have not noticed a difference in humidity for a couple of days now. In fact, I feel that the nursery is even more humid than the hallway when I open the door in the morning! Not impressed with its performance at all. Sleek, compact, and attractive design, but none of that matters if the machine does not function as intended!
customer_reviews.author: Mallorie D.

customer_reviews.title: Good looks and surprisingly good performance
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer: This review was solicited by the vendor for a small gift (temp and humidity monitor). The unit is very compact, which is great. The noise level is very acceptable and what you would expect from a unit this size. I like the clean look, and the simple one-button operation. Quite impressive performance: about half a cup of water in 1.5 days, from a regular, non-humid room. I live in a normal, non-humid climate (Northern CA). Very satisfied so far
customer_reviews.author: Oleg V. Petrakovsky

customer_reviews.title: My feedback for the deluxe mini dehumidifier is how surprisingly ...
customer_reviews.text: My feedback for the deluxe mini dehumidifier is how surprisingly quiet it is. We leave it running overnite and can barely even notice it running. It keeps the humidty level in our bathroom low which was a problem in the past.
customer_reviews.author: High in mexico

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little dehumidifier!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for a bedroom upstairs and it keeps the room dry and comfortable. It's so small and sleek, yet does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keeps not updated spaces tamed
customer_reviews.text: our bathroom is not insulated and we need this in the summer makes 100 percent difference
customer_reviews.author: nikki correia

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my dehumidifier on Amazon because I was having some issues with excess moisture in my small apartment. I love this product! It's very silent but effective. Easy to use and it looks great - it doesn't stick out like a sore thumb with my decor. I will definitely be purchasing more for other areas of my apartment. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I just could not get this to work. It barely collected any water. I ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.author: pepper8404

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in water collected.
customer_reviews.text: we have tried this dehumidifier in two different bathrooms located in two different homes. It has not collected more than a 1/4 cup of water in two or more days of running at either place. Disappointed. Gave it 2 stars as we do not have a gauge of how humid the bathrooms were but air flow is limited and 2 or more showers a day in both.
customer_reviews.author: Mbeth

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size dehumidifier for small rooms. We have a cellar room that gets damp and is too small for a regular size dehumidifier. It took out 9 oz's old water in 24 hours. It was definitive dryer after only two days of using it. The next thing I am going to use it for is a room we are going to paint. It is easy to empty and clean. It is quiet when running. I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn S.

customer_reviews.title: useless. didn't work. will return.
customer_reviews.text: useless. didn't work. will return. We're in the very humid east coast, left it running over night and not one drop of liquid in the container. Perhaps this one was/is busted. I'm returning asap.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: and it looks nice doing it
customer_reviews.text: This product is inexpensive as far as dehumidifiers go. The item was definitely pleasing and did exactly what I needed it to. My apartment stays humid due to where I live, and it made mold growth far too common. After having this plugged in for one day, I could feel the difference in the humidity. It has taken about 3 days to fill the tank to half-way. It definitely does its job, and it looks nice doing it, especially compared to similar products. The noise is only as loud as a small fan, and it's more than tolerable if you really needed results like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Wright

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It arrived well packaged and is a very nice looking unit! I am using it in my RV and it seems like it will be a great product. I think you guys made a great looking product. The only thing that you may consider adding to future models would be a nipple off the side of the tank with a cap that could be removed to add a piece of tubing for a drain. This would allow the user to route a drain line to a proper location if available and avoid needing to check and empty the reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Dart

customer_reviews.title: so good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Has been working to dehumidify a small bathroom for the last 2 months. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: diane griesser

customer_reviews.title: Great for small room
customer_reviews.text: Great little invention & investment. Loving it so far nice quiet smooth and sleek, not hard on the eye or nothing just what I expected. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Raul Ramos

customer_reviews.title: false advertised humidity gauge offer
customer_reviews.text: Dehumidifies ok. Kind of loud and the power brick gets very hot -- waste of energy. I sent feedback about the item to the manufacturer and was promised a humidity gauge that never came. Followed up and they claimed to resend -- never came. Don't fall for it.
customer_reviews.author: happykins

customer_reviews.title: Very Quiet!
customer_reviews.text: Great price for a very good dehumidifier. Very quiet. Noticeable difference after only one day in our 25 ft travel trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph White

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, quiet, and reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these in my RV to remove moisture while it is parked. It's operated almost constantly for almost 4 years! I just purchased another and felt compelled to write a review since I'm so happy with it. The product is well made, very quiet, and easy to use. It's great for small spaces like an RV or bathroom, closet, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Bill H.

customer_reviews.title: Great little product!
customer_reviews.text: We placed this in our bathroom to help with humidity and mold. So far, it's doing a great job pulling the humidity out of the air! The bathroom smells fresher. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: B. Brock

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Its small and quiet. I put it in my basement which is 16' x 12' and it is clearly removing moisture since I empty it on a regular basis. Its sleek and barely noticeable since it is designed so well. Completely satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Capozzi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: I own three Pure dehumidifiers. They work great and operate quietly
customer_reviews.author: David of Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size For Our Laundry Room!
customer_reviews.text: My Pure Enrichment Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier fits perfectly in my Laundry Room, it helps with lowering the humidity level in this room to allow our electronic panels on our Washer & Dryer to function properly. Its very quiet & stylish and on a scale to 1 to 5, I rate the product’s quality at 5.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love that the catch tank lid comes off for easy cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Great Product Amazing Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier in October 2016 and it has worked flawlessly. it worked so well that I ordered another and have 2. Recently the first unit quite working and I called their customer service who worked with me to resolve the issue I had with the unit. They are great.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than I expected, but I am willing to ...
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected, but I am willing to let it prove itself to be what is advertised. It has been running for several days but has collected little water from the air. I am hopeful though.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Harrelson

customer_reviews.title: No more humidity
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased two pure Deluxe mini dehumidifiers, I've had it for 4 days now and I can tell the difference immediately. All the water in the air has been sucked out from my apartment (I live in a basement). Thank you so much for this product I rate it a 5! ​
customer_reviews.author: Teresita Villamil

customer_reviews.title: Should have purchased a LONG time ago!!
customer_reviews.text: My small bathroom has no window and always had issues with moldy smell. I remodeled my bathroom and purchased this product and the air quality is awesome! No moldy smell and water collected in chamber is water used to water my plants! Win,win!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Got the job done.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this dehumidifier in our bathroom, bedroom, and small garage. It has done it's job collecting water in every spot. It's very quiet and not a hinderance when sleeping. It does not get hot and can be run for several days at a time before shutting off. The design is nice, but a slimmer or smaller/more compact design might be nice since it is designed for small spaces. It was crowded having the dehumidifier in our small bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Christi wilson

customer_reviews.title: 1 Year, 1 Month and Kaput.  It died!  But Vendor sent replacement!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. Used intermittently during rainy season only. Update 6/3/2018: vendor has replaced with new unit. Since it worked well for 13 months, I will give it the benefit of second trial.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery C. Ottesen

customer_reviews.title: Totally uneffective
customer_reviews.text: Attempted to use in a 25 foot RV did absolutely nothing to control humidity. returned the product with ease
customer_reviews.author: Vincent T

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Appears to work but I don't think it is good for a small 2x4 room with tomatoes growing. Update: Pure Enrichment Contacted me based on my review, wow who does that these days? Pure Enrichment does : I will be receiving a replacement to try and will update my review of the product, hopefully the first one was defective. 5 stars for customer service.
customer_reviews.author: 9er

customer_reviews.title: I would rate this unit a 5 for 5 stars 😊
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I just purchased this little unit for our lower level of our Tri-level home. I am really impressed at how quiet this unit is and just having it plugged in overnight, I already notice a huge difference in the air. If all goes well , I want to purchase the air purifier as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie White

customer_reviews.title: 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.text: The Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier is a perfect addition to my niece's nursery. I feel great about the atmosphere in there and it doesn't take up much room. It is an effective piece of equipment and I'll probably end up buying a few more to put around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, compact unit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, though the plug was bigger than I expected, so I had to find a free outlet that would accommodate it. Quiet operation. Delivered just when tropical storm Isaias got here; already a few ounces of water in collection tank after an hour.
customer_reviews.author: F. Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great for townhome!
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier is awesome! At first I was hesitant to think it would work in my living room/dining room (500ish square feet) after seeing the description indicating that it was meant for smaller spaces but I decided to try it anyway. After just two days, I was amazed at how well it works. It was half full after 48 hours! It continues to work great and I’m very happy with it! I would recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Toland

customer_reviews.title: Great little unit for a damp closet
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit for a damp closet. Much better design than the last small unit I bought, which constantly froze over until it completely broke. None of that with this - highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Beck

customer_reviews.title: Easy, elegant, efficient
customer_reviews.text: I recently bought it and just in a few days I knew I had made a wise decision. I placed it in one of our bathrooms where we have humidity issues (i.e. Mold) and the device alongside a Digital Hygrometer, will help address the source and track the issue. Great design, silent and just works. Awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paramo

customer_reviews.title: Works poorly. Loud, expensive and inefficient
customer_reviews.text: It works less efficiently than a smaller, cheaper unit I already had and couldn't even keep a small grow tent at a reasonable RH. RH was consistently 76+ while running it all day, meanwhile, the smaller unit I have keeps the tent at ~63RH. This is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Coughenour

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This dehumidifier is extremely impressive. I've had it plugged in for less than a week now in our very small bathroom. The humidity in the room has always been a problem, and the damp small was very unpleasant. Since plugging in the unit it has collected a few inches of water and the smell has almost completely gone from the room. We will soon be purchasing more for other rooms in our house to keep the humidity under control. It is a great buy and the sleek, simple design is attractive and high-end looking.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so far. It sits in my second bedroom. With the dramatic temperatures that have happened over the last month, I was having the worst time keeping the temperature and moisture steady in my house. This product is doing a great job of sucking up the moisture and I could tell a difference in 24 hours. The motor is pretty quiet which is great and it is easy to clean and operate.I'm thinking of getting a second one for the master bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: Steph S.

customer_reviews.title: small but works
customer_reviews.text: this product is very tiny but works. only recommend for rooms that are extremely small, like a closet or something.
customer_reviews.author: san francisco

customer_reviews.title: Not worth how expensive it is, barely picks up ...
customer_reviews.text: Not worth how expensive it is, barely picks up any water. Tried this out for several months while living in an apartment that had 85% humidity in Japan. Too late to return now.
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: Great compact unit
customer_reviews.text: Love the dehumidifier, was working great for a few weeks but then stopped, no power connecting to unit. Called customer service and they immediately took care of the problem and sent a new one! Great service, no hassles, thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Karen L Brazeau

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good price
customer_reviews.text: It's small, quiet, and has a nice look, so it's easy to fit into any room. Don't expect this little machine to function the same as a regular sized dehumidifier, but it does exactly what it's supposed to do. I have a small studio with a kitchen and bathroom, and it has noticeably decreased the humidity. I'd recommend this to anyone looking to dehumidify a kitchen, bathroom, basement, or other small room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to use. I put it in my bathroom and could also move it to other small areas with no problem. I highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a small space!
customer_reviews.text: Living in San Francisco I definitely needed a small dehumidifier and this one did the trick! It is good looking and small enough that you can have it out with your decor and it is not an eyesore. It comes with a warranty and customer service is responsive should you have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mini dehumidifier
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing, and returning, a different brand of mini dehumidifier I decided to give this one a try. It's small, attractive, and does a great job of removing humidity from a small bathroom. It could be a little quieter, but the noise isn't objectionable. I would recommend it for a small space.
customer_reviews.author: Swim1419

customer_reviews.title: Small, Quiet, and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pure Enrichment dehumidifier. It is very powerful despite it's small size and has made the humid NYC summer much more bearable. I also like how quiet it is. And my fluffy cat, who wilts at the slightest humidity, is much happier. 5 out 5.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Culkin

product_meta.title: Pure Enrichment Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier - Compact Water Tank Eliminates 300ml/day in Excess Moisture from Closets, Bathrooms, Boats, Kitchens and Other Small Rooms and Living Spaces
product_meta.description:
Eliminate damp air in your home or office with Pure Enrichment’s Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier. The unit’s sleek, portable design is the perfect size to keep your bathrooms, closets, and other small rooms free from excess moisture year round. Use regularly to maintain comfortable humidity levels and to keep your home free from irritating allergens like dust mites, mold and mildew.


Product Features:
Advanced Humidity Control – Eliminates up to 10 ounces of excess water from the air per day 
Removable Water Tank – Makes emptying and cleaning the unit a cinch 
Easy One-Button Control – One-touch operation is so simple you can do it in the dark 
Automatic Safety Shut-Off – Prevents overheating and keeps the water tank from overflowing 
Swiss Compact Design – Ideal for small, humid indoor spaces like bathrooms, closets, kitchens, and more 

Product Specifications
Power Supply: 100-240V, 50/60Hz, 24W (+/- 10%) 
Water Tank Capacity: 27 ounces (.8 liters) 
Absorption Rate: Approx. 10 oz per day* 

*Absorption rate may vary depending on room temperature and relative humidity. Estimate is based on 86⁰ F and 80% relative humidity. 

What's In the Box 
- Deluxe Mini Dehumidifier 
- Removable Water Tank 
- AC Power Adapter 
- User Manual
feature_bullets: ADVANCED HUMIDITY CONTROL: Extracts moisture from the air to reduce your home’s humidity levels and reduce the risk of attracting mold, mildew and other moisture-loving allergens
WHISPER-QUIET OPERATION: Operates so quietly in the background that it’s perfect for peaceful settings like a nursery or office
AUTO SAFETY SHUT-OFF: Turns off the dehumidifier when the water tank is full or at risk of overheating
TRANSPARENT WATER TANK: Makes it easy to keep track of the water level and to empty the tank when it is full

WHAT YOU GET: Dehumidifier, AC power adapter, user manual, industry-leading 2 Year Warranty, caring customer support 7 days a week, and the peace of mind that comes from a trusted brand with millions of customers worldwide.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars864 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
